oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Diagonal-preserving ring *-isomorphisms of Leavitt path algebras
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Brown, Jonathan H.
Clark, Lisa Orloff
Huef, Astrid an
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Rings and Algebras
Mathematics - Operator Algebras
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The graph groupoids of directed graphs are topologically isomorphic if and only if there is a diagonal-preserving ring *-isomorphism between the Leavitt path algebras.
Comment: We were able to remove a hypothesis from our main results. Previously, we needed the ring *-isomorphism to restrict to an algebra homomorphism on the diagonal
